instructions: Lay on bench or floor, pinch shoulder blades together to create an arch upper back, bring dumbbells next to chest
Push dumbbells up until they almost touch by squeezing biceps together, keep elbows slightly tucked
Descent the weights until dumbbells almost touch the chest

name: Bent over Row
description: Standing row bent over at roughly 45 degree angle

instructions: Bend over with your back in a 45 degree angle
Lift dumbbells into hips until elbow is behind the back with elbows angled out 45 degrees from body. Twist thumbs outwards to increase load in the rear delts
Lower the dumbbells until the arms are straight
Step over band double bandedly and bend over with your back in a 45 degree angle
Stretch band until elbow is behind the back with elbows angled out 45 degrees from body. Twist thumbs outwards to increase load in the rear delts
Release tension until the arms are straight
Stand with feet shoulder width apart, raise dumbells towards earsh with elbows tucked forward
Extend arms to full stretch into straight line of arms, head and hips, contracting abs and glutes
Slowly lower the dumbbells until back at starting position
Stand with feet shoulder width apart, pull band to chin height with elbows tucked forward
Extend arms to full stretch into straight line of arms, head and hips, contracting abs and glutes
Bring band back to starting position while maintaining a strong core

name: Reverse Crunch
description: Lying crunch that brings the legs above the head

instructions: Lie on bench and grab bench behind head for support, with the forearms against the sides of the head
Flex hips and knees to 90 degree angle and lift pelvis off the bench to bring knees towards chest without momentum
After pause at top position, slowly lower feet to start position

name: Goblet Squat
description: Weighted squat with pause at lower position

instructions: Hold Dumbbell underhand before chest, stand with feet a bit wider than shoulders
Engage core and squat down by pushing hips backwards until thighs are parallel to the ground, then pause for 2 seconds with core and legs engaged
Push back up from quads and glutes until legs are straight
Step through band such that it rests on the shoulders, stand with feet a bit wider than shoulders
Engage core and squat down by pushing hips backwards until thighs are parallel to the ground, then pause for 2 seconds with core and legs engaged
Push back up from quads and glutes until legs are straight
Stand with feet a bit wider than shoulders
Engage core and squat down by pushing hips backwards until thighs are parallel to the ground, then pause for 2 seconds with core and legs engaged
Push back up from quads and glutes until legs are straight

name: Deadlift
description: Deadlift that targets the full body

instructions: Step over band and hold ends besides calfs, stand with feet at shoulder width with knees bent and straight back and butt pushed out
Engage core and straighten the knees with straight back, while feeling tension in hamstrings
Revert to starting position by bending hips, go only as far until the back starts to round
Stand with feet at shoulder width with dumbbells in each hand, engage core
Bend at hips and push the butt out with a straight back, feeling tension in the hamstring. Go as low as possible without arching the back
Push back up by driving hips forward until knees are straight, while feeling tension in hamstrings
Stand on raised object with one foot, hold dumbbell in the hand of the same side
Use the calves to lift straight up as high as possible, with a short pause at the top position
Lower heel slowly with a short pause at the bottom position
Stand on raised object with one foot, hold object (if possible) in the hand of the same side
Use the calves to lift straight up as high as possible, with a short pause at the top position
Lower heel slowly with a short pause at the bottom position
Lay on the back with knees bent 90 degrees, holding dumbbells straight up before your chest
Engage abs and push chest towards belly button, while keeping dumbbells straight to the ceiling
Slowly lower back down to starting position, making sure the back is still flat on the ground
Lay on the back with knees bent 90 degrees, placing the arms behind the back
Engage abs and push chest towards belly button
Slowly lower back down to starting position, making sure the back is still flat on the ground
Stand straight with dumbbells in each hand
Take a step back, until the back foots knee almost touches the ground in a 90 degree angle. Keep the chest up during the movement
Step back into the starting position by engaging the front foots quads
Stand straight with legs next to each other
Take a step back, until the back foots knee almost touches the ground in a 90 degree angle. Keep the chest up during the movement
Step back into the starting position by engaging the front foots quads
Get into a plank position with the hands placed under your shoulders, tuck the shoulders back
With the elbows 30-45 degrees from the body, descend until the chest almost touches the ground
Push into the floor until you return to the starting position
Get into a plank position with the band over your back in each hands, place them under your shoulders and tuck the shoulders back
With the elbows 30-45 degrees from the body, descend until the chest almost touches the ground
Push into the floor until you return to the starting position

name: Bent Over Face Pulls
description: Face pulls with bent over body

instructions: Bent over at a 45 degree angle with dumbbells in each hand with arms hanging slightly bent from the chest
Raise arms towards the face while twisting the thumbs up until you reach a 'W' position and quickly pause
Slowly bring the dumbbells back into starting position, keeping a straight back through the movement
Bent over at a 45 degree angle with the band under your feet and in each hand
Raise arms towards the face while twisting the thumbs up until you reach a 'W' position and quickly pause
Slowly bring the arms back into starting position, keeping a straight back through the movement
Get into a plank position on your forearms with the hands flat on the floor, elbows under the shoulder
Hold the position with glutes squeezed and the hips, chest and neck in a straight line parallel to the floor
